testcaseName: Dose #1 of the Novavax Covid-19 Vaccine
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered the first dose of the two-dose Novavax Covid-19 vaccine, that the dose is considered valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
v4.25:: Updated test cast to align with the current Interim Clinical Considerations on 07/20/2022 concerning the use of the Novavax Covid-19 vaccine.
v4.20: Updated test case to align with Interim Clinical Considerations for "People who received Covid-19 vaccine as part of a clinical trial" by forecasting a second dose.
